allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: extend CSP to allow PDF.js data: URIs in workers

Adds data: to worker-src and child-src directives to fix CSP
blocking of PDF viewer resources. PDF.js vendors may load worker
scripts via blob: or data: URIs for proper rendering.

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve PDF.js version mismatch between react-pdf and pdfjs-dist

Updates:
- pdfjs-dist: 5.4.149 â†’ 5.4.296
- react-pdf: 10.1.0 â†’ 10.2.0
- Added npm overrides to force consistent pdfjs-dist version across all dependencies

This fixes the error: "The API version '5.3.93' does not match the Worker version '5.4.296'"

Both react-pdf and pdfjs-dist now use the same version (5.4.296), eliminating
version conflicts. The overrides field ensures all transitive dependencies
also use the correct version.

Docker builds will automatically pick up these changes via package.json.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
